title: Letters and memorials of Jane Welsh Carlyle.
author: Carlyle, Jane Welsh
snippet: My poor darling in Humbie Wood with me; weak, weak! could not walk, durst not (really durst nol) sit on the loyal willing Fritz, with me leading; got her a cuddy (donkey) from Dumfries (none to be heard of in Fife), but that also was but half successful.
